    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_7e6ee979852b78b977c58e6cd85276a9ee0d3f32</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_7e6ee979852b78b977c58e6cd85276a9ee0d3f32</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Breaking down mercury oxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen hinunter Quecksilberoxid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décomposition de l'oxyde de mercure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quebrar abaixo o óxido do mercúrio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suddivisione dell'ossido del mercurio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρισμός του οξειδίου υδραργύρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Subdivisión del óxido del mercurio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the breaking down of mercury oxide into mercury droplets and oxygen by means of heating.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal decomposition</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt des Quecksilberoxids in 
Quecksilbertröpfchen und des Sauerstoffes mittels der Heizung unten 
brechen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la décomposition de 
l'oxyde de mercure dans des gouttelettes de mercure et de l'oxygène 
au moyen de chauffage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra quebrar para baixo do 
óxido do mercúrio em gotas do mercúrio e do oxigênio por meio do 
heating.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la suddivisione 
dell'ossido del mercurio nelle goccioline del mercurio e dell'ossigeno
per mezzo di heating.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το χωρισμό του οξειδίου 
υδραργύρου σε σταγονίδια υδραργύρου και του οξυγόνου με τη 
βοήθεια της θέρμανσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la subdivisión del 
óxido del mercurio en gotitas del mercurio y del oxígeno por medio 
de la calefacción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quecksilberoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Aufspaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chauffage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oxyde de mercure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décomposition thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">óxido do mercúrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">decomposition térmico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossido del mercurio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">decomposizione termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θέρμανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξείδιο υδραργύρου</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">óxido del mercurio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descomposición termal</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
